name: Perplexica
short_description: AI-powered search with LLM responses - open-source Perplexity alternative.
description: Perplexica is an AI-powered search engine that uses LLMs to provide conversational answers with sources. It's an open-source alternative to Perplexity AI. Features include web search integration, source citations, multiple AI models, image search, and privacy-focused design. Uses SearXNG for search and connects to Ollama or OpenAI for LLM responses.
